election_record.label: New Hampshire 1810 Governor

sub_unit.name: Keene
sub_unit.note: John Langdon received 59 votes as John Landon.

sub_unit.name: Lyman
sub_unit.note: Lyman Town Records, Page 223 list John Langdon 59 votes, Jeremiah Smith 67 votes.
The Sun: Dover Gazette, and County Advertiser March 24, 1810 list Jeremiah Smith 59 votes and John Langdon 37 votes.

sub_unit.name: Ossipee Gore
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Ossipee Gore.

sub_unit.name: Sandwich
sub_unit.note: John Langdon received 137 votes as J. Lang.

sub_unit.name: Wolfeboro
sub_unit.note: John Langdon received 137 votes as J. Lang.
